titleStmt.title: An Exact account of the Kings march to Ardee and of his forcing the Irish to abandon the pass of the River Boyne, and of what hapn'd in the passage, as also of the Irish army's retreat towards Dublin and of our army's pursuit of them : with an address presented to the King.

notesStmt.note: Verso of sheet contains: The address presented to the King at Belfast in Ireland, on June the 16th, 1691.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
